```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false
#| include: false
library(rgl)
setupKnitr(autoprint=TRUE)
```

```{r}
#| echo: false
theta <- '𝜃'
phi <- '𝜙'
theta1 <- rep(0:1,each=12)
theta2 <- rep(rep(0:2,each=4),2)
theta3 <- rep(0:3,6)
plot3d(theta1+.5,theta2+.5,theta3+.5,type="n",
       xlab=paste0(theta,1),ylab=paste0(theta,2),zlab=paste0(theta,3),
       xlim=c(0,2),ylim=c(0,3),zlim=c(0,4),decorate=FALSE)
segments3d(rep(c(0,2),20),rep(0:3,each=10),rep(rep(0:4,each=2),4))
segments3d(rep(0:2,each=10),rep(c(0,3),15),rep(rep(0:4,each=2),3))
segments3d(rep(0:2,each=8),rep(rep(0:3,each=2),3),rep(c(0,4),12))
text3d(theta1+.5,theta2+.5,theta3+.5,
       sprintf("%s[%d,%d,%d]",phi,theta1,theta2,theta3))
view3d(-10,15,zoom=.75)
#rglwidget()
```
